"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55391fec636872643dcd0200#post_55391fec636872643dcd0200
I'm very love it or hate it with Steinbeck. I enjoyed _The Pearl_ and was ok with _The Old Man and the Sea_, but I absolutely cannot stand _Of Mice and Men._ I don't think I've ever read _The Grapes of Wrath_ though, but I probably won't want to considering I'm not interested in reading a giant book about farming.
